The first time that you shop on or after this date, please be prepared to provide a photo ID and one formal document with your name and address to verify that you live in Larimer County.   *For those who use Grace Place Church, proof of address for either Larimer County or Berthoud will be accepted. This is because of Grace Place\u2019s unique location.*    Examples of accepted formal documents:   - A utility bill  - A lease or mortgage statement  - Vehicle registration  - Mail from a business or government entity   Examples of photo ID:   Government-issued ID, including any passport  - Student ID  - Work ID  - Shelter ID  - Employment ID", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "970-493-4477", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, Outdoor Service, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Fruits & Vegetables, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 65, "regionName": "Food Bank for Larimer County", "logoBlobNameSmall": "3efe14a7-179c-4f50-b2c1-ec8eede64012.png", "website": "https://foodbanklarimer.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MT", "offsetHours": "-6", "schedules": [], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
